content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":607908,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/466b7746-7840-44ee-99d3-e074d58ce1f5/PdM info-5.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/466b7746-7840-44ee-99d3-e074d58ce1f5/PdM info-5.png?preview=true\",\"fileName\":\"PdM info-5.png\",\"name\":\"PdM info-5.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"466b7746-7840-44ee-99d3-e074d58ce1f5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1029.010498046875,\"height\":115.63945895522389},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Project team structure\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Projects can be diverse depending on the domain, client team, size, and complexity, but EPAM tries to structure all projects following the same scheme. This guarantees that on any project all main roles are covered. But it doesn't mean that one role always means one person. Depending on the complexity of a project and its needs, one person can perform several roles, or on the contrary, one role can be presented by several people. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A project team typically consists of a management team and one or more Scrum or Agile teams.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The following diagram presents the most common team Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is the primary contact for a customer on any questions with a focus on business development, and is also the key escalation point. This role mostly doesn't participate in the delivery part. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Product team\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", which usually consists of the following roles:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/EPMCPDM/Roles+definition\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Product Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"is responsible for delivering a differentiated product to the market. This product addresses a market need and represents a viable business opportunity. Although Product Managers are ultimately responsible for managing the product throughout its lifecycle — conception through end-of-life — they receive assistance throughout this process from specialists such as designers, developers, Quality Assurance engineers, supply chain and operations experts, manufacturing engineers, Product Marketing Managers, Project Managers, sales professionals, and more. Usually, this role requires close collaboration with the entire Product Management team and Business representatives. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"UX Strategist\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is responsible for the alignment of design solutions across all product (project) teams.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/display/CTOOCC/Who+is+Solution+Architect\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Solution Architect\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" is the key person in the engineering aspects of product implementation and is authorized to make changes in software design. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://kb.epam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=341560949\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Delivery Manager\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" (Delivery Lead) is responsible for delivery on the whole account. It can be a dedicated role in large setups, but it is more likely to be played by one of the project Delivery Managers in small setups.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"A\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"
